posts.author: Valkos
posts.content:
Have anyone of you tried Circle Kick in enhanced edition?

Is it still a feat that doesn't perform well?

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: I don't have EE, but while Circle Kick does give you another attack, it changes your target every round, which is not good strategy.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Quote straight out of NWNWiki:

"This feat will sometimes choose a target that is out of the range of the character's fists (but not necessarily beyond the range of the target's weapon).
If this happens, the circle kick will be attempted despite the range, but then the character will cease attacking (becoming flat-footed) because of the range.
This issue has been fixed in Neverwinter Nights Enhanced Edition."

So, at least you don't become flat-footed now.
